name: Carny Fail
description:
The intention with this game was to create an Adventure Sim following a team of carnies through the maintenance and upkeep of an unstable, and constantly degrading, traveling fair.

We were able to complete the basic behavior of patrons and some "repair" functionality for a carny.

To play what we have so far, you should start the game and if you click the "1" button, you will select your carny. By right-clicking on a damaged structure, your carny will run over and repair it.
